<a id="InputEventScreenTouch"></a>

# InputEventScreenTouch

**Inherits:** [InputEventFromWindow](InputEventFromWindow.md) **\<** [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Represents a screen touch event.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores information about multi-touch press/release input events. Supports touch press, touch release and [index](InputEventScreenTouch.md#InputEventScreenTouch_property_index) for multi-touch count and order.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="InputEventScreenTouch_property_canceled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **canceled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventScreenTouch_property_canceled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_canceled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_canceled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the touch event has been canceled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventScreenTouch_property_double_tap"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **double_tap** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventScreenTouch_property_double_tap)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_double_tap**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_double_tap**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the touch's state is a double tap.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventScreenTouch_property_index"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **index** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventScreenTouch_property_index)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_index**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_index**\ (\ )

The touch index in the case of a multi-touch event. One index = one finger.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventScreenTouch_property_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **position** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventScreenTouch_property_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_position**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_position**\ (\ )

The touch position in the viewport the node is in, using the coordinate system of this viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventScreenTouch_property_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **pressed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventScreenTouch_property_pressed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_pressed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_pressed**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the touch's state is pressed. If ``false``, the touch's state is released.
